$interpreted: Naya: ... No Theodore forces in sight. It's okay now.
Angelia: The village where Minister Nikola has been living in seclusion is right ahead. Let's go!
Naya: Hold your horses, Angel. It's too risky for you to do it yourself. I'll visit Minister Nikola; you should return to Sunshine Infantry as soon as possible.
Angelia: When minister announced his retirement, he openly stated that he wants to take a break and has no desire to come back to politics again. Right now,
Angelia: the only chance we have to persuade him to come back and help Sunshine Infantry is if I do it myself.
Naya: You have a point... the minister is apparently very stubborn. For the past 16 years, Theodore has been asking him to return to his position, but to no...
Big Po: Wahhh! Help!
Angelia: The cries of a child? It's over there!
Hyde: I'll stay back and stall it; you kids run, now!
Angelia: We'll help you!
Naya: You protect the kids. We'll handle the big guy!
Hyde: Hurry up everyone, keep up!
Naya: Woah, this big guy is a lot tougher than I thought.
Hyde: I have an idea. You, follow me!
Naya: Eh, are we running away?
Angelia: That's all we can do. Now run!
Hyde: OK, here we are!
Naya: Why are you stopping? That beast is still chasing us!
Naya: We're surrounded huh... You guys get going; I'll stay behind and stop them!
Hyde: Stop it. Everybody lie down; don't show any sign of aggression.
Angelia: Why?
Hyde: Stop asking questions; just do what I say!
Angelia: How come?
Hyde: The wolves identify it as the biggest threat, so they will take care of it first.
Angelia: I see. So that's the reason why you told us not to show any signs of aggression?
Naya: Save the chit-chat for later. Let's not waste this opportunity and get out of here first!
Angelia: Whew~ it's finally safe here.
Hyde: Apologies. Quite the emergency back there, so my tone wasn't exactly friendly...
Angelia: It's okay. Please don't let it bother you.
Hyde: Thank goodness... I'm Hyde, Thank you for saving my students.
Angelia: I'm Angel. She's my sister Naya.
Angelia: Speaking of which, how did you know that there are wolves in that area?
Naya: Yeah, it seems like you calculated everything before leading us into that area. Can you predict the future or something?
Hyde: It's breeding season now. Wolf packs will generally find an area close to a water source with plenty of shelter to breed their cubs.
Hyde: There just happened to be a place just like that nearby, hence why I decided to try my luck.
Hyde: Only until I found wolf pawprints on the ground did I really breathe a sigh of relief.
Angelia: I see. The wolf packs are on full alert due to the desire to protect their cubs. You used that to help us fight the beast.
Naya: Didn't realize that you're not only smart; but bold and careful to the perfect degree!
Big Po: Of course. Our teacher is the disciple of grandpa Nikola!
Angelia: Minister Nikola from Kingdom of the Sun?
Big Po: Indeed, the no.1 strategist of Kingdom of the Sun!

Po: Super smart, uber genius; 
used the most unpredictable of tactics, played the Desert Kingdom like a toy...
Little Po: ... and turned the tides of the Border Wars with 100 men. Lizardmen will tremble upon hearing his name, the one and only grandpa Nikola!
Hyde: If Master Nikola ever heard you kids describe him, I wonder what kind of expressions he'd make?
Angelia: Great. We just so happen to be looking for Sir Nikola. Would Sir Hyde be so kind as to introduce us?
Hyde: ... I'm sorry. Master Nikola... is no longer with us. He passed away 1 year ago...
